articles.description: Safari 26 introduces 75 new features, including CSS updates and deprecations. Get the full rundown of the latest CSS enhancements.

articles.description: Learn how CSS Overflow 5 features enable more accessible and flexible carousel patterns for improved user experience.

articles.title: Inset Shadows Directly on img Elements (Part 1)

articles.title: How much do you really know about media queries?

articles.title: Web Weekly #169 (#blogPost)
articles.author: Stefan Judis
articles.description: Get excited about the upcoming CSS corner-shape property, Safari 26 features, and explore new web dev tools and music recommendations.

articles.title: Keyframe animations have a special role in the CSS cascade (#tilPost)
articles.author: Stefan Judis
articles.description: Uncover how CSS keyframe animations are prioritized in the cascade, applying styles before other non-important rules for predictable animations.

description: Discover the fusion of motion and interactivity to create immersive web experiences. Learn how Readymag's canvas empowers designers to transcend traditional templates, and explore AI-driven intent prototyping for faster ideation. Gain insights into the latest CSS features from Safari 26, and delve into creative styling with a custom CSS Feed for Bluesky. This edition also highlights the impact of optimized viewport settings on mobile interaction speed and innovative ways to manage event listeners efficiently.
joke: Why did the JavaScript developer keep running into walls? Because they never handled their promises!
challenge: Create an interactive image carousel using CSS Overflow 5 features for a seamless user experience. Enhance your project with dynamic SVG filters to apply inset box-shadow effects directly on images, and use native JavaScript APIs to optimize event listener management. Aim for accessibility and performance, ensuring your carousel is both visually appealing and functional across devices.
